element.name: DESCRIPTION
element.text: This algorithm analyzes the statistical correlation between two raster layers.

element.name: GRID
element.text: The raster layer containing the X variable.

element.name: GRID2
element.text: The raster layer containing the Y variable.

element.name: METHOD
element.text:
The type of function to adjust.
* Best fit (try all the possible options and choose the one that gives a higher correlation value.) * y = a + bx * y = a + b / x * y = a / (b - x) * y = ax ^b * y = a e^(bx) * y = a + b·ln(x)

element.name: OUTPUT_DESCRIPTION
element.text: A scatterplot graph and a text output with regression values
